titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Science fiction magazines, about 1946-2006.
titlestmt.author: Compiled by Gabriel McKee and Sam Kilroy Kugelberg

publicationstmt.publisher: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by RMC Staff, August 2009

Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections

Ithaca, NY 14853
(607) 255-3530

did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Approximately 78 science fiction magazine titles, including complete or near complete runs of Analog, Magazine of Fantasy and Science Fiction, Astounding, Isaac Asimov's Science Fiction, and Galaxy.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Science fiction magazines, #8032. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
